newsitem.title: USA: Cubist, in collaboration with Novalon.
newsitem.headline: Cubist, in collaboration with Novalon.

text.p: Cubist Pharmaceuticals Inc and Novalon Pharmaceutical Corp said Thursday they have entered into a research collaboration to accelerate and broaden the development of screening technologies for genomic targets.

Under the terms of the collaboration, Cubist will purchase a minority equity stake in privately held Novalon for $1 million. In addition, Cubist mill make research support payments and pay royalties on sales of products developed using the Novalon technology.
Novalon has also granted Cubist an exclusive six month option to acquire all of the outstanding shares of Novalon.
The companies said they will use novel high-throughput techniques to screen pools of genomic targets, establish functional genomic databases and identify novel inhibitors of promising targets.

The companies expect that these novel screening technologies will enable rapid screening of targets that have been identified using genomics and implicated in causing disease, but for which there is not enough scientific information to develop biochemical assays.
